author: Jean P. May, Jr.
releaseNotes:
2.1.11 - option to minimize attribute updates
2.1.10 - add Text Logging option
2.1.9 - use singlethreaded to prevent collisions
2.1.8 - change responseReady to datatype string
2.1.7 - fix bug on IP parameter pass for endpoint method
2.1.6 - data.ip -> data.ipAddress bug
2.1.5 - restart scheduled ping on reboot
2.1.4 - address HTTP endpoint method timeout
2.1.3 - add regex pattern check on ipAddress
2.1.2 - handle null return
2.1.1 - add dummy refresh method
2.1.0 - add option to used HTTP endpoint instead of API
2.0.4 - fix scheduling bug with new method
2.0.3 - fix zeroes bug under 2.2.7.121
2.0.2 - Fix new method min value reporting
2.0.1 - fix a presence error with new method
2.0.0 - Use the new ping method if hub on 2.2.7.x or greater
